name: Galarian Farfetch'd

evolution.description: Galarian Farfetch'd can evolve into a Sirfetch'd at level 8 and above, after enduring a single battle where it lands three critical hits. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Wild Duck Pokémon. Farfetch'd always carries a leek that is twice as long and heavy as its own body and never lets go.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when this Pokémon fails a saving throw against a negative condition, it can choose to pass instead.

abilities.name: Scrappy
abilities.description: This Pokémon's Normal and Fighting type moves ignore immunities granted by a Pokémon's type. If a target’s secondary type gives it vulnerability or resistance to the attack, it follows the secondary type for that effect.
